summary: This document appears to be a page from grand jury material listing specific counts and dates of alleged criminal conduct by Jeffrey Epstein and others, including charges of enticement of a minor and travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct. It is marked confidential and references a Jane Doe #3.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein faced multiple federal charges including enticement of a minor and numerous counts of travel to engage in illicit sexual conduct.
Two co-defendants, Hyperion and Jege, are named alongside Epstein on specific travel-related charges.
The charges span from late 2004 through mid-2005, indicating a pattern of alleged criminal activity during this period.
The document is marked as confidential grand jury material and references a victim/witness identified as Jane Doe #3.
The document lists specific counts and dates, providing a detailed timeline of the alleged offenses.
